post.body: "holy fecal bits"=one 4 the books along w/2day's weather. Worst.Driving.Conditions.Ever. & I'm last 2 admit it cuz i luv snow driving
yeah - your tweeting on hwy/school/work closures, requests from post office, etc, helpful to get in real time.
I helped a neighbor use cat litter to great effect yesterday. need you a shoveling buddy? whitman says "don't drink and shovel"
i agree w comment 7 on http://tr.im/2mds. realize i'm in minority of lefties on this. post itself makes great points re "fallacy"
nice snow person!
totally read that wrong. it rubs me the *wrong* way.
agree re:24ways. case of demonstrating what's possible with state of the art overrule what works well, perhaps?
oh no... shoveling?
Setting out to reclaim car from Les Schwab (dropped off 8 this morning, finished at 2:30pm). ::checks valley transit schedule::...
realizing i may be "snowed in" by end of the day, 1st time in life. This is epic. Still, glad I'm not in icy Seattle or powerless northeast
Congrats 2 @ubnews on becoming a highly useful source of info at times like these! Humble suggestion: create @ubnews-emergency or some such
my dashboard weather forecaster still says today will be sunny. methinks them meteorologists r a bit behind the curve on this one.
Spent 5 min looking out window with my child, explaining school/work cancellations, how nice it is to be safe and warm. mind you he's a cat.
Officially not excited by Obama's appointments. I respect prioritizing diversity of thought, but he better be damn good at holding reins
i think this is the eight inches we were supposed to get yesterday. geez.
Sidewalk need shoveling fifteen feet behind me where I just shoveled it. So, the co-op will be closed today. Great day to work at home!
Just discovered Jeff Buckley. Wow. How've I missed this guy until now?
... speculations of new features, declarations about how life is changed, and interviews with competitors trying to imitate, er, improve it.
Idea: viral video on fan anticipation 4 new Quicktime release. Lines outside Apple stores, QT logo costumes, keynote crowd reaction shots.
iTunes installer puts a Quicktime shortcut on my desktop because... why? Who ever needs to launch Quicktime?
Wait... Twitter seems to have just automatically tinyurl-ized my link. What's going on?
LOVING IT: http://tinyurl.com/5ewof5
Stuck in brain: "Last Christmas" by George Michael. Be glad you're not me.
i love this: http://blogs.msdn.com/ie/archive/2005/06/23/431980.aspx "why wait for elegance? Just do the old clunky time consuming thing!"
Methinks gmail labs tasks rather lacking. squandered email integration possibilities FTL. Sticking w/ GTDInbox & RTM (rip iwantsandy)
returned to ww yesterday for a meeting. heading back to P-town today... but way too much to do first. hoping to get there b4 8pm...
overconfidence post lappy screen repair --> Matt makes Lina's beloved ibook g4 screen's minor issue much worse. dog house for me...
returned from back to back xmas parties. squeezing in bit of productivity before bed.
"when you're coding to you ever say you're 'text wrangling'?" - my brother. guess what text editor i use.
we keep such silly hours whenever the family is together again. 'sides Lina @ 8pm w/ tummy ache, i was first to bed @ 2am. & first up. wha?
At parents' house now. (hooray!) WHY didn't i bring my computer games that won't run on Leopard with me?!? WHY!?
Lappy rides again! manually replacing screen saved nearly $550 FTW. harder than expected but everything works again. missed all those pixels
ever get that feeling when something you're coding isn't working that you're overlooking some reallllly obvious syntax error? arg.
& by "entire comment thread", i meant like the first 30 or so. Okay, time to move on with life...
wow. that entire comment thread is worth reading. that, like, never happens in comment threads.
comment 13 also key. inauguration is entire nation's, NOT obama supporters'. including opposition > not ruffling supporters' feathers.
bad idea for browser memory? Simulate glitter with infinite jquery loop making elements dis- & reappear & so on in succession?
Thx 4 sympathy but its not all bad - i get to have xmas twice, 1 in walla, 1 in portland a few days later. I feel quite cheery about this.
not driving to pdx today. 1st day we could get thru, but wouldn't make it up parent's hill, and xmas dinner is postponed anyway. ah, pdx.
my mac and browsercam do not get along. crashed three times... worked w/o problems on work PC.
